
**************************************************************
*            Stride Performance Test Results                 *
**************************************************************

Testing on 10000 array elements each of size 4 bytes with stride 1.
Total array size is 40000 bytes.

Elements in the array are accessed with write/read pairs.
This is done first on element[0], then element [1] and so on.
The entire process is repeated 4 times.

No sum of array elements was maintained. All simulated cache 
traffic was from array accesses.

Total element accesses: 80000  (40000 read and 40000 write)
Total bytes accessed: 320000


==============================================================
          Aggregate Cache and Performance Statistics
==============================================================

Simulated Cache Characteristics:
--------------------------------

Lines=64  Associativity=1 (direct mapped)  Block_size=8192
Total cache size is: 524288 bytes

The simulated cache is a "write-back" type: dirty blocks are not written
to memory until evicted, at which time a "write_for_eviction"
is recorded. When a line is written partially, then a
"read_for_write" accounts the need to read the line from
memory before updating it.

Performance Results:
--------------------

Accesses=80000  Hits=79995 (100.0%)
Read Misses=0 (0.0%) Write Misses=5 (0.0%)  Evictions=0
Reads=40000  Writes=40000  Reads_for_writes=5  Writes_for_evictions=0
Dirty blocks remaining=5

Time for hits=80.00us  Time for memory reads=500ns
Time for memory writes (including flushing dirties)=650ns
Estimated total memory access time:   With caching=81.14us   No caching=9.20ms
Speedup: 113.4x


==============================================================
          Contents of individual cache line controls
==============================================================

Tag has 45 bits

Line  Valid   Dirty Tag
    0   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    1   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    2   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    3   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    4   VALID DIRTY 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    5 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    6 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    7 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    8 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    9 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   10 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   11 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   12 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   13 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   14 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   15 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   16 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   17 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   18 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   19 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   20 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   21 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   22 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   23 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   24 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   25 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   26 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   27 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   28 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   29 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   30 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   31 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   32 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
   33 INVALID CLEAN 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
